creator: bcharloup@jouve.fr
text:
Sometimes when I call the help on JMeter, from the "Help" item, JMeter is
completely frozen, the only solution is to use the task manager of Windows to
kill the application.
This situation occures, at least, for 50% of calls.
I'm using Sun JVM 1.4.2_09 + Windows XP Pro SP2

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
This has never happened to me.

Can you explain exactly what you are doing to cause this?

Are there any messages in the console window or jmeter.log?
